content.rendered:
Nothing is more disappointing than finishing a series you love on Netflix. It is discouraging when you scroll through Netflix looking for a new show to get pulled into, but can’t seem to find something that interests you and your roommate. There are thousands of TV shows and movies on Netflix, so it often feels like you spend more time scrolling and less time chilling and bonding with your roommate! So, if you’re feeling stuck and discouraged from Netflix browsing, look no further! because we’ve got 7 Netflix binge-worthy Netflix shows that you won’t be able to stop watching. You can watch these alone or on your roommate movie night. Either way, you’re going to have so much fun!

1. One of the newest binge-worthy Netflix shows: Emily in Paris

This is the newest binge-worthy Netflix shows out there. It’s show is perfect for lovers of comedies and romance! Netflix recently released Emily in Paris as a Netflix Original Series. This show follows a young woman named Emily Cooper. Emily is a young and driven twenty-something that works for a marketing firm in the Midwest. She is unexpectedly relocated to Paris and begins to work for a fashion company as a social media guru. This show is perfect if you are looking for something light and charming to watch! Put this one on during and your roommate movie night and enjoyy!

2. One of the funniest binge-worthy Netflix shows: Schitt’s Creek

Need a good laugh? Give Schitt’s Creek a try! Schitt’s Creek is a sitcom series that follows the demise of a wealthy family. When the Rose family unexpectedly lose all their money, they are forced to relocate to Schitt’s Creek, their only remaining asset. The family consists of the father, Johnny Rose, the mother, Moira Rose, and their two spoiled 30-something children, Alexis and David. There’s nothing better than bonding with your roommate over a great comedy show!

3. One of the most chilling binge-worthy Netflix shows: Unsolved Mysteries

Do you enjoy thrillers and documentaries? If you do, give this show a try! As everyone knows, true-crime documentaries are the most binge-worthy Netflix shows that exist! And Unsolved Mysteries delivers just that. Each episode in this series follows a different unsolved criminal case. This Netflix Original is full of shocking disappearances, murders, and paranormal encounters. This should make your roommate movie night very interesting.

4. Dead to Me

Dead to Me is a dark comedy that follows the friendship of two women, Jen and Judy. When Jen’s husband passes away tragically from a hit and run, she is left as a single mother to two boys. Consequently, Jen begins to attend a grief group in order to cope with her loss. But, there she meets Judy and the two form an unexpected friendship. This series is full of twists and turns and is sure to make you laugh along the way!

5. The Haunting of Hill House

Bonding with your roommates over some horror shows is a classic roommate experience! This series is perfect to binge on Halloween! The Haunting of Hill House is both a horror and drama series. So, the show alternates between flashbacks and present-day events. It follows the lives of 5 adult siblings who grew up together with their mother and father in Hill House. During their time at Hill House, the siblings experience numerous paranormal events, which they carry with them throughout their lives. This show has an intricate plotline and many twists and turns. Keep an eye out for hidden ghosts in the background while you’re watching! This is the scariest binge-worthy Netflix shows of all, so proceed carefully!

6. Ozark

Enjoy crime series? Then Ozark is the perfect show for you. Ozark is a Netflix Original crime and thriller series that follows a regular family that mistakenly gets involved with a Mexican drug cartel. Marty Byrde forces his family to move from their home in Chicago to the Ozarks in order to launder money to repay debt to a drug boss. Ozark is one of the best binge-worthy Netflix shows that is sure to keep you on the edge of your seat.

7. Stranger Things

Another perfect TV show to binge on Halloween! This is one of the original binge-worthy Netflix shows! Stranger Things is a drama, sci-fi, and mystery series that takes place in Indiana in the 1980s. When a 12-year-old boy named Will goes missing near a secret government laboratory, his three friends try desperately to find him. They soon encounter mysterious events, unravel government secrets, and befriend an unusual 12-year-old girl. So take bonding with your roommate to the next level and dress up as characters in the show for Halloween! Trust us, it’s really fun!

D’you know what else Roomi does outside of helping its readers find Binge-worthy Netflix Shows? With our ever-increasing lists of rooms and roommates across the world, we help you find your perfect match! Download the app here and hop on the easiest ride home, ever!

jetpack-related-posts.title: The Best Shows To Watch On Netflix In 2021
jetpack-related-posts.author: Team Roomi
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: One of the biggest things we were grateful for in 2021 was Netflix. And the internet, of course! We can't even begin to imagine what quarantine would be like without them. Having said that, finding a genuinely binge-worthy show on Netflix can be quite a daunting task - and often…

img.alt_text: man sitting with his feet up on the table watching netflix in quarantine

jetpack-related-posts.title: Helping Your Roommate Through a Break Up (Beyond Ice Cream and Rom Coms)
jetpack-related-posts.author: Team Roomi
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: In many ways, New York city roommates become family. You celebrate good times together – promotions, engagements and personal goals. You also see each other through the bad times - work stress, family drama and the emotional affair that is a break up. We all know what goes in the…

img.alt_text: roommates, break up, relationship advice, In a relationship, new york city roommates

jetpack-related-posts.title: Top 7 Movies On Netflix To Watch In 2020
jetpack-related-posts.author: Team Roomi
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: The search for good movies on Netflix can be a daunting task. It's especially a struggle when your partner or Roomi have to agree on something. You may spend forever arguing about the dishes or cleaning, but we've got your back on what to watch on Netflix next. Our recommendations…

img.alt_text: couple deciding which movies on netflix to watch

jetpack-related-posts.title: Roommate Bonding Activities To Do While Living With A Roommate
jetpack-related-posts.author: Team Roomi
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: When you’re living with a roommate who’s a stranger, it can be awkward. Even if the person you're moving in with is a close friend of yours, you don't really know that friend until you live with them every day. That's just the way life works. You're all basically starting from scratch…

jetpack-related-posts.author: Team Roomi
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: The holiday season is upon us! And now all of the troubles and turmoil this year has come with seem to be at bay,. At least as long as the tree is up, fuzzy socks are hung, and Mariah Carey is being played. So to round it all off? Curling…
